温度和降雨发现可以推动全球登革热动态Kim Jae Kyoung的研究团队是KAIST数学科学系教授，兼基础科学研究所生物医学数学小组首席研究员（IBS）的首席研究员，已经公布了有关天气如何影响登革热传播的新见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/temperature-and-and-rainfall-found-found-to-drive-denge-denge-denge--fever-dynamics-globally.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/temperature-and-and-rainfall-found-found-to-drive-denge-denge-denge-denge--fever-dynamics-globally.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98ce51D2-0641-4C66-9ED9-650CFC510848 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 21:47:44 -0500 Temperature and rainfall found to drive dengue fever dynamics globally
研究发现法师4和PTEN损失如何促进侵袭性肿瘤的生长在科学进步上发表的一项研究揭示了一种新的策略，允许肿瘤逃避人体对消除至关重要的免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/study-uncovers-how-mage-4-and-pten-loss-pten-loss-promote-aggromet-aggressive-tumor-wrowth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/study-uncovers-how-mage-4-and-4-and-pten-loss-pten-loss-promote-aggrome-aggressive-tumor-tumor-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b842f3ed-93fd-425e-425e-8d2a-553cec409326 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 21:42:31 -0500 Study uncovers how MAGE-4 and Pten loss promote aggressive tumor growth
公平健康启动资源以支持阿尔茨海默氏症的护理计划和费用今天，作为由约翰·A·哈特福德基金会（JAHF）资助的国家倡议的一部分，国家独立的非营利公平健康为阿尔茨海默氏病推出了新的共享决策工具，该工具具有自我保健和药物治疗方案的临床信息，以及相关的成本信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/fair-health-launches-resource-to-to-support-alzheimers-care-care-parh-planning-planning-planning-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/fair-health-launches-resource-to-to-to-to-support-alzheimers-care-care-phar-planning-planning-planning-planning-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AE2FB048-88B2-4FF0-A128-89CA45754970 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 21:38:42 -0500 FAIR Health launches resource to support Alzheimer's care planning and costs
1型糖尿病患者面临的心血管风险低于2型糖尿病与2型糖尿病患者相比，在JSCAI上发表的一项新研究显示，与1型糖尿病患者（通常称为少年糖尿病）患者患心血管事件的风险较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/type-1-diabetes-patients-patients-face-lower-cardiascular-cardiescular-cardiscular-cardiscular-risk-than-type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/type-1-diabetes-patients-patients-face-face-lower-cardiescular-cardiescular-risk--risk-than-type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=adef1347-757E-4027-B2A8-78AD6F5ACA85 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 21:34:02 -0500 Type 1 diabetes patients face lower cardiovascular risk than Type 2 diabetes
新的平衡测试可以帮助预测老年人的跌倒场景很常见。一个老人似乎身体健康，直到有一天他们跌倒，从那时起，他们的生活质量开始恶化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/new-balance-test-test-could-help-predict-falls-falls-in ofder-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/new-balance-test-test-could-help-predict-faldict-falls-inderer-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=874Ab100-f31E-4855-bdbf-d7b7b7b7bbed5b1c6 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 21:29:42 -0500 New balance test could help predict falls in older adults
研究确定维生素E琥珀酸酯是肿瘤生长控制的关键高水平的脂肪质量和与肥胖相关的蛋白质（FTO）与肿瘤的生长增加和对免疫疗法的耐药性有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/study-indistifies-vitamin-e-succinate-succinate-as-key-key-toumor-toumor to-toumor-to-tumor-growth-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/study-indistifies-vitamin-e-succinate-ascinate-as-key-to-tumor-toumor-toumor to-tumor-growth-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dabd0054-a67a-4f0d-b46b-d25509f56ace Wed, 12 Feb 2025 21:25:44 -0500 Study identifies vitamin E succinate as key to tumor growth control
住房损失导致儿童心理健康斗争在成本较高并且社会安全网的时候似乎进一步濒临灭绝，驱逐，取消抵押品赎回权和住房损失的经验会对家庭产生可衡量和有害的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/housing-loss-causes-mental-health-health-nealth-nealth-cluggles-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/housing-loss-causes-mental-health-health-nealth-cluggles-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebadbfbe-7263-420f-b93f-b93f-805639d58286 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 21:13:16 -0500 Housing loss causes mental health struggles in children
麦克马斯特大学研究人员发现了新的血液凝血障碍麦克马斯特大学（McMaster University）的研究人员在血液学领域进行了突破性的发现，为自发性和不寻常的血液封闭的解释提供了一种解释，尽管接受了全剂量血液稀释剂的治疗，但仍继续发生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/mcmaster-university-researchers-discover-new-new-blood-clotting-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/mcmaster-university-researchers-discover-new-new-blood-clotting-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5411577-7C88-4CD0-B2C6-F6AAA8F3EF6FE Wed, 12 Feb 2025 21:10:18 -0500 McMaster University researchers discover new blood clotting disorder
新的研究提高了对帕金森氏病阶段的理解通过一项研究，分析了20个不同国家的2500多人帕金森氏病人的大脑图像，科学家能够识别神经退行性的模式，并为该疾病的五个临床阶段中的每个阶段创建指标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/new-research-Advances-underding-of--parkinsons-disease stages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/new-research-Advances-undvances-underding-of-parkinsons-disease stages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69f1b22e-0CAA-4C89-89-8F1A-3EC68C30973D Wed, 12 Feb 2025 21:06:05 -0500 New research advances understanding of Parkinson's disease stages
具有自修复电子皮肤的可穿戴健康技术的突破研究人员通过开发一种新型的自我修复电子皮肤（E-SKIN）来取得突破，该技术在伤害后几秒钟内修复自身。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/breakthrough-in-wearable-health-tech-with-with-with-self-healing-electronic-skin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250212/breakthrough-in-wearable-health-tech-with-with-with-self-healing-lectronic-skin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7B186C52-27BA-462A-B8EE-5832417BD626 Wed, 12 Feb 2025 20:58:42 -0500 Breakthrough in wearable health tech with self-healing electronic skin
